nodes.text: Danz Borin was a bounty hunter who worked for Jabba Desilijic Tiure. He also was an excellent pilot.

Borin was on Tatooine in the Mos Eisley Chalmun's Cantina on the fateful day in which Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Luke Skywalker arrived for transportation from Han Solo and Chewbacca. He was hoping to collect the bounty for Solo. Luckily, the Rodian Greedo found the Corellian smuggler first. After a short shootout, Borin had one less business rival to take care of.
Borin was portrayed by Chris Bunn in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, who also played a Stormtrooper in the film, but was not given any credit.
